directions: Pour soy sauce and mushroom stock into a large skillet over high heat; whisk in miso paste and oyster sauce until dissolved, 2 to 3 minutes. Add bok choy and mushrooms; bring to a rolling boil. Reduce heat to medium, cover skillet, and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon miso paste, or to taste
1 teaspoon oyster sauce, or to taste
title: Bok Choy and Shiitake Stir Fry
